text: The news out of El Paso is devastating. I'm heartbroken for the victims and their families. Far too many communities have suffered through tragedies like this already. We must act now to end our country's gun violence epidemic.

The people of El Paso are contending with the horrifying aftermath of a mass shooting. Sadly, far too many people nationwide have felt their anguish. As we pray for the dead, their families, and El Paso, we must renew our resolve to address gun violence in our country.
